original_title: Laugfs also hikes LP gas prices
original_body_lines: Laugfs Gas PLC, one of the two largest liquefied petroleum (LP) gas suppliers in the country, has also decided to increase its domestic LP gas cylinder prices.
Accordingly, the price of a 12.5 kg cylinder has been increased by Rs. 755 to Rs. 4,740 while the price of the 05 kg cylinder has been increased by Rs. 305 to Rs. 1,900.
Litro Gas had also announced an increase in the prices of its domestic LP gas cylinders with effect from today (January 01).
Accordingly, the price of the 12.5 kg Litro gas cylinder has been increased by Rs. 685 to Rs. 4,250 while the price of the 05 kg cylinder has been increased by Rs. 276 to Rs. 1,707.
Meanwhile, the price of the 2.3 kg Litro cylinder has been hiked by Rs. 127 with the new price of Rs. 795.
